# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed with exceptional quality and functionality in mind. This product stands out from the rest, offering unparalleled performance and durability. We believe it's worth more than its face value, but we're willing to make it accessible to you at an introductory price of $75. Don't miss this opportunity to experience the difference for yourself! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
